U

updateDice(Player) - Method in class View.BoardGUI
accessor(selector): Updates the Players Dice on the info Box
post-condition: Changes the Labels of the Players Dice on the info Box
updateinfo(Player) - Method in class View.BoardGUI
accessor(selector): Updates the info box (Month,turn,Dice)
post-condition: Changes the Labels of the info Box (Month,turn,Dice)
updateJackpot(Player) - Method in class View.BoardGUI
accessor(selector): Updates the Players Jackpot on the Board
post-condition: Changes the Labels of the Players Jackpot on the Board
updatePlayer(Player) - Method in class View.BoardGUI
accessor(selector): Updates the Players Stats (Money,Bill,Loan)
post-condition: Changes the Labels of the Player (Money,Bill,Loan)
updatePosition(Board, Player) - Method in class View.BoardGUI
accessor(selector): Updates the Players Position on the info Box
post-condition: Changes the Labels of the Players Position info Box
